meanings.sent1: The overwatched child played in the park under the watchful eye of his parents.
meanings.sent2: The security guard overwatched the building to ensure no one entered unauthorized.
meanings.sent3: The overwatched puppy kept trying to sneak away, but the owner was always watching.
meanings.sent4: The overwatched garden flourished under the careful attention of the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The overwatched experiment yielded accurate results due to the constant monitoring.

meanings.definition: Past tense of overwatch, meaning to watch over or supervise closely
meanings.sent1: She overwatched her little brother as he played in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The security team overwatched the event to ensure everyone's safety.
meanings.sent3: He overwatched the cookies baking in the oven to make sure they didn't burn.
meanings.sent4: The teacher overwatched the students during the exam to prevent cheating.
meanings.sent5: The scientist overwatched the reaction carefully to note any changes.
